transcript: I want to be the father that when Timmy wins 10-0 I can look at him and be like I'm disappointed in you not because of the outcome because I know you could have tried harder and on the flip side if he loses 10-0 I'm going to be like Timmy you worked your ass off you left it all on the field I'm proud of you my biggest area of interest in terms of my own performance has been truly divorcing outcome from winning it's really easy to say and really hard to do
